content: the jade beanie knitting pattern by kristie lau handmade by chris & kris https //www etsy com/ca/shop/handmadebychrisnkris instagram @handmadebychrisnkris email handmadebychrisnkris@gmail com 1 | p age introduction the jade beanie is a quick project and uses bulky weight yarn to knit up this pattern uses the right twist and left twist stitches to create the cabling effect information skill level beginner skills required cast on knit in the round knit two together knit three together purl two together right twist left twist materials and tools 3 2 oz / 75 yds of malabrigo rasta or similar weighted super bulky 6 yarn 8mm / us11 16 circular knitting needles 10mm / us15 16 circular knitting needles 10mm / us15 double pointed needle dpns or 10mm / us15 circular knitting needles with a longer cord for the magic loop method stitch marker scissors large tapestry needle gauge 10 stitches x 12 row on a 4 x4 stockinette swatch with 10mm / us15 needles finished measurements 8 wide by 9 long sizing fits a medium size 21 -22 5 adult head abbreviations co = cast on k = knit k2tog = knit two stitches together k3tog = knit three stitches together rt = right twist 1 insert right needle into the first two stitches on the left needle and knit together 2 keeping both stitches on needle knit the first stitch on the left needle 3 drop both stitches off needle 4 please see video courtesy of new stitch a day https //youtu be/vlf44j6afwk lt = left twist 1 insert right needle into the back loop of the second stitch on the left needle and knit do not slip stitches off the left needle 2 insert right needle into the front loop of the first stitch on left needle and knit 3 drop both stitches off needle 4 please see video courtesy of new stitch a day https //youtu be/0julfdwikso p = purl 2 | p age p2tog = purl two stitches together sm = stitch marker st s = stitch es * = repeat pattern note this pattern is worked in the round brim with 8mm / us11 16 needles co 48 sts place sm and join in the round rounds 1 8 *p2 k2 p2 k1 p1 k2 p1 k1* body change to 10mm / us15 16 needles round 1 *p2 k2 p2 k6* round 2 *p2 rt p2 k2 rt k2 * round 3 *p2 k2 p2 k6* round 4 *p2 rt p2 k1 rt lt k1 * round 5 *p2 k2 p2 k6* round 6 *p2 rt p2 rt k2 lt * repeat rounds 1 to 6 two more times before decrease decrease switch to dpn s or magic loop method when it becomes too tight to knit round 1 *p2tog k2 p2tog k2 k2tog k2* 36 sts round 2 *p1 k2 p1 k5* 36 sts round 3 *p1 k2tog p1 k2tog k1 k2tog* 24 sts round 4 *p1 k1 p1 k3* 24 sts round 5 *k3tog* 8 sts
